frontmatter.title: Random thought: on building a house

node.excerpt: Failure is a good thing if you handle it well. What — note it down, every single one of them should be listed. Why — find the root cause…
Listening is the best thing I can think of right now while I’m on commute. Podcast, audio book (Youtube sometimes but annoying when you must…
I’m turning 35 next year, it passed half life already so I should step forward carefully. Pick what’s really matters and prioritize them, be…
